reuters.title: LM ERICSSON <ERICY> UNIT INTRODUCING PRODUCT
reuters.body: <LM Ericsson Telephone Co> of Sweden said its Ericsson unit in the U.S. introduced a cellular system for small cellular telephone markets. The company said its CMS 8800/S system incorporates Ericsson hardware and software. It said extra base stations and voice channels can be added to the system in modular blocks. Reuter 
